info.name: Amanleek : WordPress task
info.description:
# Introduction
lists data about some articals in my blog in the wordpress

# Overview
I used bitnami environment to get have my blog in wordpress
then I added some posts (dummy posts) in this blog
after that ... going to the HTTP requests in the postman to see the api results
using the get method : http://localhost/wordpress/index.php/wp-json/wp/v2/posts (local host / path )

it response with all the data about the dummy posts that have been added

response.name: New Request
